entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued January 04 at 12:33PM MST by NWS
entry.summary: ...STRONG WINDS AND BLOWING SNOW TO CONTINUE THIS AFTERNOON... A fast-moving arctic cold front has pushed through the area, bringing strong northwest winds and blowing snow. Winds will gust to 50-65 mph through the afternoon. Blowing snow will reduce visibilities to a mile or less at times. Motorists should expect rapidly changing weather conditions.
